Package com.es.unex.practica_sistemas_inteligentes

Class CoverageArea

java.lang.Object
com.es.unex.practica_sistemas_inteligentes.CoverageArea
public class CoverageArea
extends java.lang.Object
Class defining the structure of the area to be covered and how to extract this matrix from the total area.
Version:
0.1
Author:
eliapacioni

    • CoverageArea

      public CoverageArea​(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int minimumPower)
      Parameters:
      x1 - coordinate X point 1
      y1 - coordinate Y point 1
      x2 - coordinate X point 2
      y2 - coordinate Y point 2
      minimumPower - Minimum signal coverage (power) within the area Parametric builder, defines an area to cover
